attributes.review: This app keeps on taking me back to my home screen. It’s glitching and takes to much space on my phone. Don’t download this app. It’s not very good.

attributes.review: gen z is the STRONGEST generation, taking away tiktok just makes us STRONGER because no we know you’re listening. We will come out on top. We won’t stop fighting until you are out of office. BLACK LIVES MATTER✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
